verbs.description: [ARG0: MSNBC 's Rachel Maddow] [V: broke] down [ARGM-MNR: in tears] [ARGM-LOC: on - air] [ARGM-CAU: over a report] [ARGM-ADV: about the Trump administration operating " tender age " shelters for migrant babies and toddlers] . Maddow choked up while reading the first lines of the Associated Press ' report on the three facilities where children under the age of 13 are being sent after being separated from their parents at the border .
